status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3c5u","text":"Innoculate 1 colony from a fresh plate of the strain to be made electrocompetent into   in a 125 ml flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"5060AA806B8B11EA8B2749CCA0AD1B72","id":0,"label":"SOB","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"884bc","text":"Pre-warm two 1 L flasks containing   pre-warmed to  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"250","guid":"68E425F06B8B11EA8B2749CCA0AD1B72","id":0,"label":"each of SOB","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"81DCBD70A8AC11EA99795714C581E8D4","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dc0p8","text":"Add two drops of the overnight culture to each of the pre-warmed 250 ml flasks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5cd8","text":"Place cultures   for  . From this point on the cultures must be kept ice cold.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"8DDB7F206B8B11EA8B2749CCA0AD1B72","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"934CEDE06B8B11EA8B2749CCA0AD1B72","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3daqm","text":"Pour each 250 ml culture into chilled 500 ml (or 1000 ml) centrifuge bottles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"k0q","text":"Pour off the supernatant and aspirate any residual broth.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ujk","text":"Add   to each of the centrifuge bottles and completely suspend the cells by pipetting up and down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"250","guid":"CCDC57806B8B11EA8B2749CCA0AD1B72","id":0,"label":"glycerol","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2dcen","text":"Pour off the supernatant and suspend the cells in the residual glycerol by pipetting up and down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":54,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o6uj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3r3fj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f7kdn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9k9a0","text":"To freeze, add   to microcentrifuge tubes  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":13,"offset":22}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"25rrk","text":"At this point you can electroporate or freeze the cells away. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/Electroporation-Protocol-imsv6v"},"mutability":"","type":"link"}}}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"100","guid":"655EC130A8AE11EA8CB20A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"culture","unit":1}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"75224EE0A8AE11EA99795714C581E8D4","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"37","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7f2v7","text":"Once you have used all of the culture, transfer the tubes to dry ice for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"57CB5BC06B8C11EA8B2749CCA0AD1B72","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c64df","text":"Once the cultures are frozen, transfer them to a -80°C freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"750se","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8jfm6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7k0pa","text":"The cultures should be good for \u003e6 months.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c378e","text":"Shake at   and   until the cultures reach an OD600 of 0.5-0.7. {"blocks":[{"key":"k0q","text":"Pour off the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6o2ns","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7rgr4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9ocne","text":"It is not necessary to aspirate any residual broth.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
